mapper.select: select c.CUSTOMER_ID, c.CUSTOMER_NAME, c.CUSTOMER_PERSON, c.CUSTOMER_TEL, c.CUSTOMER_EMAIL, c.CUSTOMER_ADDRESS from wms_customer c
select c.CUSTOMER_ID, c.CUSTOMER_NAME, c.CUSTOMER_PERSON, c.CUSTOMER_TEL, c.CUSTOMER_EMAIL, c.CUSTOMER_ADDRESS from wms_customer c where c.CUSTOMER_ID = #{id}
select c.CUSTOMER_ID, c.CUSTOMER_NAME, c.CUSTOMER_PERSON, c.CUSTOMER_TEL, c.CUSTOMER_EMAIL, c.CUSTOMER_ADDRESS from wms_customer c where c.CUSTOMER_NAME = #{customerName}
select c.CUSTOMER_ID, c.CUSTOMER_NAME, c.CUSTOMER_PERSON, c.CUSTOMER_TEL, c.CUSTOMER_EMAIL, c.CUSTOMER_ADDRESS from wms_customer c where c.CUSTOMER_NAME like concat(concat('%',#{customerName}),'%')
